attributes.action: Give the hero Stephen Sutton(cancer patient) a knighthood
attributes.additional_details: I am starting this petition as the 19 year old Stephen Sutton has just passed away of cancer. 15/05/2014. RIP. In my opinion this young brave man deserves a knighthood in his memory he died at such a young age and has achieved more than most of us will in our life time.  I don't see how some celebrates get one and this man hasn't. He has done so much for so many even though he knew he was going to die! Please sign without hesitation
